geonames_api Module¶

geonames_api.fetch_JSON(params, username)[source]¶

Function to search geonames for a given parameter.

Parameters :

params: String. :

Search parameters for geonames.

username: String. :

Geonames username.
geonames_api.get_lat_lon(params, username)[source]¶

Function to retrieve geographical information from geonames.org, parse the returned data and retrieve the latitude and longitude.

Parameters :

params: String. :

Search parameters for geonames.

username: String. :

Geonames username.
geonames_api.make_params(params_dict)[source]¶

Function to transform a dictionary of parameters into search terms for geonames.

Parameters :

params_dict: Dictionary. :

Dictionary of search parameters.
